metadata.name: RANDOM
metadata.description:
AUDIO ON - FULLSCREEN ON
 
"RANDOM" is an experimental scanograph stop motion made of 117 frames, handdrawn frame by frame with acrylic paint directly on EPSON A4 scanner assembled with Photoshop to compose the animation.
Audio is composed with free VST plugins and my original voice.

VIDEO
1584x1080px
frame rate 50fps
.mp4
--------------
Irene D'Ant√≤ 2023
